alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Galveston Island; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued December 30 at 3:32AM CST until December 30 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High risk of rip currents and elevated surf along area beaches. * WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands, Galveston Island, and Bolivar Peninsula. * WHEN...Through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If visiting the beach while temperatures remain well above normal, keep in mind that lifeguards are not staffed at summertime levels and may be unable to assist as rapidly compared to the spring, summer, and fall months.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
